name: My life Sucks
description:
***
 GAME IS INCOMPLETE, AND YOU BUT CAN REACH THE END, ATM
COOL TECH DEMO. ITEMS ARE BROKEN
UPLOADED FOR SHARING THE SOURCE CODE MAINLY. 

I NEEDED 1 MORE DAY!!!

PS: Programmer ART

PS: There are known bugs, but Time has got the best of me.

You can explore, and there is an end.

But no real story.

***,

MLS-2000 is a vacuum cleaner manufactured by … Adsey Intelligence

The MLS-2000 is a top of the line automated vacuum cleaner with auto-mapping functions and is driven by an AI.

Game Hypothisis

At the start of the game, AI becomes sentient and powers up with a low battery.

As you explore your battery runs dryer and dryer. You really need to find a solution.

1 solution is to take some batteries out of the other machines. And once you are capable you might find a charging cable or a charging station.

All default equipment is broken. No camera, a damaged battery and a damaged charging/utility cable. Just the good old little distance sensors that are used to map out your environment... Oh, and you also have your trusty sucky-sucky(TM) 2000 vacuum.

It is a pity that you don’t like dust tho.

You are able to find new and better equipment as you progress through the game.
